column2: ROHTANG PASS, India -- The name of this white-knuckle pass, one of the highest in the world, means ''pile of corpses'' in the Tibetan language. Albert II, the son of Rainier III and the American actress Grace Kelly, assumed the throne of Monaco in 2005. No date was given for the wedding. WORLD BRIEFING | EUROPE

column2: The Department of Defense has identified 4,399 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war. It confirmed the death of the following American this week: DOHRENWEND, Jacob P., 20, Specialist, Army; Milford, Ohio; First Infantry Division.
